Text: Tried finding MOCCASIN FLATS on the web with no luck.  So I ordered the 3 season box set  from www.bigsoul.net.  For making season 2 of BLACKSTONE available, when I could find it nowhere else, I would be pleased to send you a copy of the boxset for free if you're still interested.  If so, e-mail me at jamesb381@aol.com.  Again, THANKS for the Blackstone downloads.....................JIM
